description: Seven Dixon"The Goliath"Ht: 5'11"Wt: 210lbsSeason W/L Record (0-0)Mitch Vaughn"The Machine"Ht: 5'10"Wt: 205lbsSeason W/L Record (2-1) Hot newcomer Seven "The Goliath" Dixon is up against "The Machine" Mitch Vaughn.
